result.execSummary:
The defendant Alexander E Roelke was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Alexander E Roelke is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Alexander E Roelke was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Alexander E Roelke was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Each ct concur.  Transfer of probation authorized to Columbia Co.

miscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge remitted. $268  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

timeConds.notes: With huber. If late to report to jail, no Huber privileges.  Transfer of jail authorized to Columbia Co.
9/21/16 Crt orders contidional jail time from 6/6/16 to 11/2/16 (150 days).

miscConds.notes: $343  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1 (except jail time).
